subject: Fishing, Sport
Fish and Other Marine Life
lead_paragraph: There is a reason the Kanektok River has remained so spectacular: the only way to fish it is to fly to the lake on a bush plane outfitted with pontoons and float a raft to the mouth.
snippet: There is a reason the Kanektok River has remained so spectacular: the only way to fish it is to fly to the lake on a bush plane outfitted with pontoons and float a raft to the mouth.
